she sure what I do know chosen and

1967 was when China was most backward
and closed off
there was no fashion at all the Cultural

neon piano lessons that passionate in
the early 80s I wanted to enroll in a

Virginia Hall in 1997 I quit my
well-paid job to follow my dream and set

at that time but I wanted to pursue my

for the most beautiful women oh it
appears you won as a result of my
childhood I now particularly like fancy

I don't know how beautiful it will get I
can keep improving it maybe when I'm old
I still won't have designed my ultimate
dress but I want to keep on doing it
tissue wasn't my dress is a record of
the time we live in
it's a record of our memories thoughts
and emotions China has been developing
rapidly and in the course of this we've
lost quite a bit of our history my
generation has a responsibility to
rediscover our missing history and
culture and pass on our traditions I
want people in a hundred or five hundred
years time to look at my dresses and to
know how people lived today the audience
